title: MIFlowCyt Instrument - MIACA instrument schema merging

model.description: The instrument model shall be specified (e.g., CytMeter Elite-2000). It may include the instrument serial number.

other.description: Additional relevant instrument details should be provided and may include machine-specific information such as information about automated agitation, temperature control, controlled volume dispensing, sampling from microtiter plates, auto-boost, auto-flush, etc. Other custom settings shall be provided if relevant and may include setting name, description, and value.

manufacturer.description: The instrument manufacturer shall be specified by stating its name (e.g., MIFlowCyt Cytometry Systems, Inc.). A URL pointing to manufacturer web pages may also be provided.

configurationAndSettings.description: The system and its configurations have significant impact on experimental results and as such the following shall be provided

lightSources.description: Each light source (e.g., laser) shall be described stating the following:

instrumentSpec.description: e.g. objective lenses, numerical aperture, filters

instrumentType.description: Instrument type, e.g. liquid handling robot, centrifuge, FACS, Plate Reader, etc.

vendor.description: Details to the vendor or manufacturer, Contact details of the source of the reaction vessels, e.g. company

ID.description: Instrument identifier as stored by the database

description: Merge between the MIFlowCyt Instrument and the MIACA instrument schema
